title: So You Like Me Too - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Awkward Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Secret Crush   Short Story
author: One Puffed Rice Cake   一个米饼
description:
A sweet story about having a crush.

Since a long time ago the shou has been secretly in love with the gong, but the gong wasn’t aware of this. After the gong meets the shou later, he falls in love with the shou and starts chasing him.

It is a sweet fluffy story that is filled with warmth.
>
